snippet: Max Mirnyi of Belarus and Andrea Hlavackova of the Czech Republic defeated Santiago Gonzalez of Mexico and Abigail Spears of the United States, 7-6 (5), 6-3, in the mixed doubles final of the United States Open on Friday.
abstract: Max Mirnyi of Belarus and Andrea Hlavackova of the Czech Republic defeated Santiago Gonzalez of Mexico and Abigail Spears of the United States, 7-6 (5), 6-3, in the mixed doubles final of the United States Open on Friday.

headline.main: Mirnyi Adds Another Grand Slam Title to His Collection
